archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0862
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want the most up to date and relevant systems and search tools by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.value: There should be no delays. Even if an action was done a minute ago it should be available to search for in the system.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
